channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose Paving Slab On Speed Hump, 14th December
item.description:
Outer lower edge of speed hump, furthest away from the roundabout - loose paving slab that lifts up when pressure is applied to either side.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Kingfisher Drive, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The sign is illegible problem, 14th December
item.description:
maintenance of the radar speed activation sign on the B4632 on Cleeve Hill ( near the Stockwell Lane junction). It’s been out of action for well over 2 years.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing pavers on pavement outside sub-station, 14th December
item.description:
Hanover St, opposite junction with Hudson St, outside entrance to substation. Several pavers are missing from the pavement along with damaged paving slabs, this has created a large (50x40cm approx) pothole in the pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hudson Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned road cones on grass verge, 14th December
item.description:
Cones just before number 20
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Hartlebury Way, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 14th December
item.description:
3) due to Lack of street cleaning there is frequently standing water at the section from the former carriageway onto the cycleway bridge. There are also deposits of mud and other detritus.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 14th December
item.description:
2) Due to poor verge maintenance the footway adjacent to the derelict potentially development site is unusable
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Actually, I think the iron work has been fixed, but JSP or Ringway I’ve left. The Barry is here for a good six months now and some bags of burst, 14th December
item.description:
Can somebody please come and tidy it up?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Shakespeare Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5th insurance of flytipping in recent months, 14th December
item.description:
This must be linked to houses nearby, please could a flytipping camera be installed to try and catch theses people.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Shepherds Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 14th December
item.description:
Customer reported flooding on lane. Fast flowing water from West Ridge. Water collecting on lane in several areas, often across span of road, and bringing debris and gravel down. Blocked ditch and drains. Becoming dangerous for pedestrians and motorised wheelchair users
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole creating such a noise where it is loose/sunken?? Noise is getting worse daily, 14th December
item.description:
The manhole is on the Shurdington Road but outside 1 Farm Lane, GL51 4XL
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Street Lights not working, 14th December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Hollis Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th December
item.description:
email rec 12/12/2023 - Hello. Can we use a tree surgeon to clip the height of this tree? Silver birch – height issues. Cleeve Cloud Lane Identified on map in orange and green square. Thanks
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A large vehicle has been up the lane and damaged the verges causing mud and debris to be left on the road., 14th December
item.description:
Stump Lane, not sure of exact location.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury

item.title: Large amount of water, 14th December
item.description:
After rain and for a long time after very large puddles on both sides of road .Worse on South side atJunction Naunton Lane.Pedestrians have no way to avoid getting wet when cars pass and cars cannot avoid if traffic coming other way.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Waterfield Close, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Sinkhole starting, 13th December

item.title: Fallen / felled tree completely blocking path. Dangerous to access path, 13th December
item.description:
Follow Cotswold way past postlip hall farm and take the public footpath to the isbourne way. Access to this path is completely blocked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
